snippet: Its unpredictable leader agrees to family reunions between citizens of South Korea but goes full tilt on his nuclear program.
abstract: Editorial welcomes North Korea's acceptance of South Korea's proposal to hold long-overdue family reunions between citizens of both countries; warns North Korean leader Kim Jong-un's unpredictability means that skepticism is warranted, particularly given the continuing advancement of his country's nuclear weapons program.
lead_paragraph: Its unpredictable leader agrees to family reunions between citizens of South Korea but goes full tilt on his nuclear program.

headline.main: A Tiny Glimmer From North Korea
headline.print_headline: A Tiny Glimmer From North Korea
